configurations.description: Enables experimental `apache-shenyu.meta.` prefixed span attributes `app-name`, `service-name`, `context-path`, `param-types`, `id`, `method-name`, `rpc-type`, `path` and `rpc-ext`.
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.apache-shenyu.experimental-span-attributes

description: This instrumentation does not emit telemetry on its own. Instead, it augments existing HTTP server spans and HTTP server metrics with the HTTP route and Shenyu specific attributes.
name: apache-shenyu-2.4
